sourcesContent:
<form [formGroup]="empform" (ngSubmit)="submit()">
    <label>name</label>
    <input type="text" formControlName="name" class="form-control" id="name" placeholder="name">
    <label>Address</label>
    <input type="text" formControlName="addr" class="form-control" id="addr" placeholder="addr">
    <input type="text" formControlName="city" class="form-control" id="city" placeholder="city">
    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary mb-2">submit</button>
</form>
